events.name: nullHUB - January 2026
events.description: A virtual networking event for the APAC ServiceNow community. Connect with peers, share experiences, and build lasting relationships.

events.name: nullSTACK Alpha - April 2026
events.description: Virtual sessions and networking for the EMEA ServiceNow community. Learn from practitioners and connect with peers across the region.

events.name: nullSTACK Beta - July 2026
events.description: Virtual sessions and networking for the India ServiceNow community. Discover insights from local experts and expand your professional network.

events.name: nullEDGE - October 2026
events.description: The flagship nullEDGE conference returns for 2026. A full day of deep technical sessions, networking, and knowledge sharing for the global ServiceNow community.
